name: Float for the Stars!
description:
You are a balloon who is currently escaping the atmosphere...

Don't you want to reach those stars in the sky?

This is a simple scrolling bullet hell game where your health affects your size! Float up through the sky while avoiding obstacles to stay inflated, but watch out- you'll gradually deflate, so you'll have to gain more air by absorbing gusts of wind.

CREDITS:

  • Music by SoupCube!
  • Everything else is by me!!

(Game developed as the final project for a class!)
